00007 function setReporting() {
00008         global $config;
00009         ini_set('log_errors', 'On');
00010         ini_set('error_log', ROOT.DS.'tmp'.DS.'logs'.DS.'error.log');
00011         if ($config->development_environment == true) {
00012                 error_reporting(E_ALL|E_STRICT);
00013                 ini_set('display_errors','On');
00014         } else {
00015                 error_reporting(E_ALL|E_STRICT);
00016                 ini_set('display_errors','Off');
00017         }
00018 }

00024 function stripSlashesDeep($value) {
00025         $value = is_array($value) ? array_map('stripSlashesDeep', $value) : stripslashes($value);
00026         return $value;
00027 }
00028 
00032 function removeMagicQuotes() {
00033         if ( get_magic_quotes_gpc() ) {
00034                 $_GET    = stripSlashesDeep($_GET   );
00035                 $_POST   = stripSlashesDeep($_POST  );
00036                 $_COOKIE = stripSlashesDeep($_COOKIE);
00037         }
00038 }

00043 function unregisterGlobals() {
00044         if (ini_get('register_globals')) {
00045                 $array = array('_SESSION', '_POST', '_GET', '_COOKIE', '_REQUEST', '_SERVER', '_ENV', '_FILES');
00046                 foreach ($array as $value) {
00047                         foreach ($GLOBALS[$value] as $key => $var) {
00048                                 if ($var === $GLOBALS[$key]) {
00049                                         unset($GLOBALS[$key]);
00050                                 }
00051                         }
00052                 }
00053         }
00054 }

00059 function callHook() {
00060         global $url, $config;
00061 
00062         if($url == '/'){
00063                 $url = null;
00064         }
00065         if(is_null($url)){
00066                 die(header('Location: '.$config->base_url.$config->index_file.$config->default_location));
00067         } else {
00068                 //code igniter style
00069                 if ( ! preg_match("|^[".preg_quote($config->allowed_uri_characters)."]+$|i", $url)){
00070                         die(header('Location: '.$config->base_url.$config->index_file.'errors/invalid-characters/'));
00071                 }
00072                 $urlArray = array();
00073                 $urlArray = explode("/",$url);
00074                 if($urlArray[0] == ''){
00075                         array_shift($urlArray);
00076                 }
00077                 $controller = $urlArray[0];
00078                 if(!isset($urlArray[1]) || empty($urlArray[1])){
00079                         $action = 'index';
00080                 } else {
00081                         $action = $urlArray[1];
00082                 }
00083                 array_shift($urlArray);
00084                 array_shift($urlArray);
00085                 $queryString = $urlArray;
00086         }
00087         if(strpos($action, '_') !== false){
00088                 error404($url);
00089         }
00090         $controllerName = $controller;
00091         $controller = ucwords($controller);
00092         $model = $controller;
00093         $controller .= '_Controller';
00094         $action = str_replace('-', '_', $action);
00095         $dispatch = new $controller($model,$controllerName,$action);
00096         if ($action[0] !== '_' && in_array($action, get_class_methods( $controller ))) {
00097                 $action = str_replace('-', '_', $action);
00098                 call_user_func_array(array($dispatch,$action),$queryString);
00099         } else {
00100                 error404($url);
00101         }
00102 }
00103 
00108 function __autoload($className) {
00109         global $config, $url;
00110         
00111         //echo "auto_load $className";
00112         //autoload helpers (load the users helpers, then load ours so functions can be overridden)
00113         foreach($config->auto_load['helpers'] as $helper){
00114                 if(file_exists(ROOT . DS . 'application' . DS . 'helpers' . DS . strtolower($helper) .$config->helper_prefix. '.php')){
00115                         include_once(ROOT . DS . 'application' . DS . 'helpers' . DS . strtolower($helper) .$config->helper_prefix. '.php');
00116                 }
00117                 if(file_exists(ROOT . DS . 'library' . DS . 'helpers' . DS . strtolower($helper).'.helper.php')){
00118                         include_once(ROOT . DS . 'library' . DS . 'helpers' . DS . strtolower($helper).'.helper.php');
00119                 }
00120         }
00121         //controllers
00122         if(strpos($className, '_Controller') !== false){
00123                 $className = str_replace('_Controller','',$className);
00124                 if (file_exists(ROOT . DS . 'application' . DS . 'controllers' . DS . strtolower($className) . '.php')) {
00125                         include_once(ROOT . DS . 'application' . DS . 'controllers' . DS . strtolower($className) . '.php');
00126                 } else {
00127                   error404($url);
00128                 }
00129         }
00130         //library classes
00131         else if (file_exists(ROOT . DS . 'application' . DS . 'library' . DS . strtolower($className) . '.class.php')) {
00132                 include_once(ROOT . DS . 'application' . DS . 'library' . DS . strtolower($className) . '.class.php');
00133         }
00134         else if (file_exists(ROOT . DS . 'library' . DS . 'classes' . DS . strtolower($className) . '.class.php')) {
00135                 include_once(ROOT . DS . 'library' . DS . 'classes' . DS . strtolower($className) . '.class.php');
00136         }
00137         //models
00138         else if (file_exists(ROOT . DS . 'application' . DS . 'models' . DS . strtolower($className) . '.php')) {
00139                 include_once(ROOT . DS . 'application' . DS . 'models' . DS . strtolower($className) . '.php');
00140         } else {
00141                 error404($url);
00142                 //throw new Exception('Class not found '. strtolower($className));
00143         }
00144 }
